sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental) When making a Knowledge skill check, the character may spend one Destiny Point to substitute Knowledge (Underworld) or Streetwise for the required skill. Any information gathered by a subsequent success on this check may be suitably embellished by the GM to reflect its criminal and underworld origins.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Talk the Talk</name> <number>TAL0001261</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:54:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b39fa7e52f18a850e0f497eef699b617</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:54:49</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
